name: CategoryTheory.Functor.closedIhom_map_app
initialProofState:
D : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid D
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed C
F X‚úù Y‚úù : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
g : Quiver.Hom X‚úù Y‚úù
X : D
‚ä¢ Eq ((F.closedIhom.map g).app X) ((CategoryTheory.ihom (F.obj X)).map (g.app X))
decl:
/-- Auxiliary definition for `CategoryTheory.Functor.closed`.
The internal hom functor `F ‚ü∂[C] -` -/
@[simps!]
def closedIhom (F : D ‚•§ C) : (D ‚•§ C) ‚•§ D ‚•§ C :=
  ((whiskeringRight‚ÇÇ D C·µí·µñ C C).obj internalHom).obj (Groupoid.invFunctor D ‚ãô F.op)

initialProofState:

F Y : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
X‚úù Y‚úù : D
f : Quiver.Hom X‚úù Y‚úù
‚ä¢ Eq ((F.closedIhom.obj Y).map f) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.pre (CategoryTheory.inv (F.map f))).app (Y.obj X‚úù)) ((CategoryTheory.ihom (F.obj Y‚úù)).map (Y.map f)))
decl:
/-- Auxiliary definition for `CategoryTheory.Functor.closed`.
The internal hom functor `F ‚ü∂[C] -` -/
@[simps!]
def closedIhom (F : D ‚•§ C) : (D ‚•§ C) ‚•§ D ‚•§ C :=

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.closedUnit_app_app
initialProofState:
D : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid D
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed C
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
X : D
‚ä¢ Eq ((F.closedUnit.app G).app X) ((CategoryTheory.ihom.coev (F.obj X)).app (G.obj X))
decl:
/-- Auxiliary definition for `CategoryTheory.Functor.closed`.
The unit for the adjunction `(tensorLeft F) ‚ä£ (ihom F)`. -/
@[simps]
def closedUnit (F : D ‚•§ C) : ùü≠ (D ‚•§ C) ‚ü∂ tensorLeft F ‚ãô closedIhom F where
  app G :=
  { app := fun X => (ihom.coev (F.obj X)).app (G.obj X)
    naturality := by
      intro X Y f
      dsimp
      simp only [ihom.coev_naturality, closedIhom_obj_map, Monoidal.tensorObj_map]
      dsimp
      rw [coev_app_comp_pre_app_assoc, ‚Üê Functor.map_comp, tensorHom_def]
      simp }

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.closedCounit_app_app
initialProofState:
D : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid D
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed C
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
X : D
‚ä¢ Eq ((F.closedCounit.app G).app X) ((CategoryTheory.ihom.ev (F.obj X)).app (G.obj X))
decl:
/-- Auxiliary definition for `CategoryTheory.Functor.closed`.
The counit for the adjunction `(tensorLeft F) ‚ä£ (ihom F)`. -/
@[simps]
def closedCounit (F : D ‚•§ C) : closedIhom F ‚ãô tensorLeft F ‚ü∂ ùü≠ (D ‚•§ C) where
  app G :=
  { app := fun X => (ihom.ev (F.obj X)).app (G.obj X)
    naturality := by
      intro X Y f
      dsimp
      simp only [closedIhom_obj_map, pre_comm_ihom_map]
      rw [tensorHom_def]
      simp }

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.monoidalClosed_closed_adj
initialProofState:
D : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid D
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed C
X : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
‚ä¢ Eq CategoryTheory.Closed.adj { unit := X.closedUnit, counit := X.closedCounit, left_triangle_components := ‚ãØ, right_triangle_components := ‚ãØ }
decl:
/-- If `C` is a monoidal closed category and `D` is groupoid, then the functor category `D ‚•§ C`,
with the pointwise monoidal structure, is monoidal closed. -/
@[simps! closed_adj]
instance monoidalClosed : MonoidalClosed (D ‚•§ C) where

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.ihom_map
initialProofState:
D : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid D
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed C
F G H : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
f : Quiver.Hom G H
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.ihom F).map f) (F.closedIhom.map f)
decl:
theorem ihom_map (F : D ‚•§ C) {G H : D ‚•§ C} (f : G ‚ü∂ H) : (ihom F).map f = (closedIhom F).map f :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.ihom_ev_app
initialProofState:
D : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid D

‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.ihom.ev F).app G) (F.closedCounit.app G)
decl:
theorem ihom_ev_app (F G : D ‚•§ C) : (ihom.ev F).app G = (closedCounit F).app G :=

initialProofState:
